chat.footer: Agent SDK Chat - Powered by Claude Agent SDK
chat.emptyMessage: Type a message to start a conversation

session.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete?

tag.name: Tag name
tag.deleteConfirm: Delete this tag? This action cannot be undone.
tag.deleteDisabledReason: Tag "{name}" has {count} sessions attached. Please remove the tag from sessions first.

errors.alreadyExists: A tag with this name already exists
errors.hasSessionsSuffix: sessions attached. Please remove the tag from sessions first.

language.title: Language
language.description: Set the display language for the application.

customModels.title: Custom Models
customModels.description: Create and manage custom models with system prompts.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Manage Claude Agent SDK Skills. Skills provide reusable instructions to Claude.

titleGeneration.title: Auto Title Generation
titleGeneration.description: Automatically generate titles from conversation content when starting a new chat.
titleGeneration.enabledDescription: Automatically generates a title after the first assistant response when starting a new chat.
titleGeneration.modelDescription: Select the model for title generation. Lightweight Haiku models are recommended.
titleGeneration.promptDescriptionPart1: is replaced with user messages and assistant responses. Output is expected in JSON format

general.title: General Settings
general.defaultModelDescription: Set the default model for new chats. You can change it individually on the chat screen.
general.defaultPermissionModeDescription: Set the default permission mode for new chats. You can change it individually on the chat screen.
general.thinkingDescription: Enabling Claude's extended thinking allows for deeper reasoning. Token usage may increase.
general.approvalTimeoutDescription: Set the timeout for tool execution approval. Automatically stops on timeout. Set to 0 for unlimited.

permissions.title: Default Allowed Tools
permissions.description: Checked tools are automatically allowed when starting a new chat. Unchecked tools require confirmation each time.

sandbox.title: Sandbox Settings
sandbox.description: Restrict Claude Code's execution environment for enhanced security. In sandbox mode, it operates only within the specified workspace.
sandbox.workspacePathDescription: Specify the working directory for Claude Code. Relative paths (./workspace) or absolute paths (/path/to/workspace) can be used.
sandbox.claudeMdTemplateDescription: If CLAUDE.md does not exist in a new workspace, it will be auto-created from this template. Existing CLAUDE.md files will not be overwritten.

appearance.title: Appearance Settings
appearance.description: Customize the user and Claude icons displayed on the chat screen.
appearance.faviconDescription: Set the icon displayed in the browser tab
appearance.imageFormats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP supported (optimized to {size}px)
appearance.userNameDescription: Name displayed in chat (shows "You" if blank)

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.description: These settings are for advanced users. Please review carefully before making changes.

showUsage.title: Usage Display
showUsage.label: Enable Usage Display
showUsage.description: Add a link to usage display in the sidebar. View subscription usage using local Claude Code credentials.
showUsage.dialogDescription: Enabling this setting will display subscription usage using local Claude Code credentials.
showUsage.dialogPoint1: This feature is intended for personal use only
showUsage.dialogPoint2: Providing subscription credentials to third parties may violate Anthropic's terms of service

default.label: Default
default.description: Use normal permission settings (confirm on tool execution)

fiveHour.title: 5-Hour Session Usage
fiveHour.description: Usage in current session (5-hour rolling window)

sevenDay.title: 7-Day All Models Usage
sevenDay.description: Total usage of all models in the past 7 days

sevenDaySonnet.title: 7-Day Sonnet Usage
sevenDaySonnet.description: Sonnet model usage in the past 7 days

sevenDayOpus.title: 7-Day Opus Usage
sevenDayOpus.description: Opus model usage in the past 7 days (for Max plan)

errors.credentialsNotFound: Credentials not found. Please log in to Claude Code.
errors.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh token. Please log in again.
errors.unauthorized: Authentication failed. Please log in again.

models.title: Custom Models
models.description: Create and manage custom models with system prompts.
models.name: Model name
models.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this custom model?
models.emptyHint: Click "Create New" button to create one.
models.identifierHint: Only alphanumeric characters and hyphens allowed
models.systemPromptPlaceholder: Enter a prompt to define the role and behavior of this model...
models.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Reviews code for quality and best practices
models.skillsSettingsHint: Configure Skills enabled/disabled for this model. Default follows global settings.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Manage Claude Agent SDK Skills. Skills provide reusable instructions to Claude.
skills.name: Skill name
skills.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this skill?
skills.emptyHint: Click "Create New" button to create one.
skills.identifierHint: Only alphanumeric characters and hyphens allowed
skills.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Reviews code for quality and best practices
skills.contentHint: You can specify name, description, allowed-tools, model in YAML frontmatter
skills.addSkillsHint: Add skills from the settings page.

iconPicker.imageFormats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP supported (optimized to 128px)
iconPicker.removeImage: Remove image and revert to icon

filePreview.unsupportedFormat: This file format cannot be displayed
filePreview.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback
filePreview.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support audio playback
filePreview.contentPlaceholder: File content will be displayed here

gitClone.title: Clone Git Repository
gitClone.largeRepoHint: Large repositories may take longer to clone

errors.notFound: Repository not found. Please check the URL
errors.authFailed: Authentication failed. Please check your access permissions
errors.folderExists: Folder "{name}" already exists. Please specify a different name
errors.timeout: Clone operation timed out. Large repositories may take longer
errors.pathTraversal: Access outside workspace is not allowed

workspaceSelector.selectWorkspaceHint: Select a workspace and enter a message
workspaceSelector.selectWorkspaceDesc: Select the directory where Claude will operate

workspaceBadge.dirHint: Claude will perform file operations within this directory.
